commit message:
NestedScrollView enhancements

- Use nestedscrollview instead of scrollview for pre-ics devices
- enable smooth scrolling
- fix a few things

update strings to avoid problems during gradle build

&update apk

bump version to 4.0

& update readme, changelog etc ...
fix fab position on prelollipop devices

WebView enhancements

1. WebView gets a new look on >=ICS devices
2. The image on the article is now at the center
3. Removed fab button on pre-ICS devices

Introducing the new articles UI

The article ui gets a new awesome look:
https://plus.google.com/+EnricoDortenzio/posts/RQxnGy169U8

- We use ScrollView for pre-ICS devices to fix text overlapping problems
inside articlefragment

- code cleaning

set minSdk to 9 (android 2.3+)

because of material dialogs and materialish progress.
